### Predictions

Now that we have performed some post-analysis visualization, we can create some predictions based off of our final GLM.

For example we can perform a prediction on David Pastrnak, who has been a great player for Boston for the current Season. The following are David's varaibles that are needed for this model:

| Variable | Value |
| :---: | :---: |
| Shots | 9 |
| timeOnIce | 1,336 sec |
| PrimaryPosition | RW |
| Weight | 195 |
| Nationality | Czech |
| Hits |  0 |
| Age | 26 |
| FaceoffTaken | 0 |
